message:
Version 1.0.6 is out! Changelog:
• Added stowing mechanic, see full changelog on GitHub
 or Discord for a guide!
• Changed default rig if Shipyard Expansion is installed
• Slightly increased rudder power
• Added notification system (this thing!)
• Added a pillow option to act as a bed
• Added default name to make nameplate more visible
• Added centered tiller option
• Some techincal changes
Check Discord or GitHub for the full changelog
skidbidbi
